Posts.Content: Jul 17, 2018 09:33AM daughterofmom wrote: Hi all, Thank you so much for your responses! They were very helpful at such a stressful time. We heard from her doctor nothing to worry about on the xray and that platelets are back to normal. It is a huge relief! A very nice doctor got the results back to us very fast at least this time. Thank you again, and wishing you all the best.
Posts.Title: Worried about my mom and metastasis daughterofmom JoE777
